Chapter.Title: Python Question 1
Chapter.Data: Merscythe starts playing with the program in the device by making changes to it. What change will open the tree door? After you have changed the program in the editor, run the program. If the program is correct, the output of the program will be “The door is open”. This will unlock Chapter 2.

Instruction.Code:
class Door
Method Description
open() Method to open door
close() Method to close door
knock() Method to knock on door
